entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hiya guys !
I am Muralidhar Reddy from College of Engineering, Guindy studying final year IT.This is my first blog post. I have been considering the idea of blogging my experiences, my thoughts etc since a year. But it didnt take off till now due to various reasons.
And this being my first post , I won’t be helding you for long.
So..
echo “Hello World”
